lac.metrics

Class ConfusionMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.metrics.ConfusionMatrix

  • public class ConfusionMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Confusion matrix used to calculate easily all the metrics of the quality of the classifications
